branchCategory.name: CRBU2-Z
branchCategory.description: <p>Rotary actuator series CRBU2-Z is a free mount style, rotary actuator with direct mounting available in six types of direct mounting.  Through the  adoption of specially designed seals and stoppers, a rotation angle of 270° has been achieved for the first time in a compact vane style actuator.  To support thrust and radial loads, bearings are used throughout the series. </p>

branchItem.name: C(D)RBU2*10~40-Z, Rotary Actuator, Free Mount, Vane Type
branchItem.description: <p>Rotary actuator series CRBU2-Z is a free mount style, rotary actuator with direct mounting available in six types of direct mounting.  Through the  adoption of specially designed seals and stoppers, a rotation angle of 270° has been achieved for the first time in a compact vane style actuator.  To support thrust and radial loads, bearings are used throughout the series. </p>
